org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.query.filter.expression

Interface BooleanExpression

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Expression<Object>, Filter, GenericExpression, Persistable, Predicate
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanFieldValue, BooleanLiteral

    public interface BooleanExpression
extends GenericExpression, Predicate
    An expression representing a boolean value. Also acts as a predicate since the expression itself can be interpreted as either true or false. Any non-boolean object will evaluate to true if it is non-null.

    • Method Summary
